Robot Properties.name: What Drive Train do they have?
What kind of motors do they use for their drive train?
What is the weight of their robot? (Without bumpers)
What is the height of their robot when carrying a note to score?
Any other comments about their robot in general?

Auto.name: How many different routes do they have?
Can they avoid other bots during auto?
Do they score the notes in the middle during auto?
Any other comments about their auto?

Scoring.name: Can they score in the amp during teleop?
Can they score in the speaker during teleop?
Can they do on the fly shooting?
Can they intake from the floor?
Can they intake from the source directly?
From how far can they score in the speaker?
Any other comments about their scoring?

Endgame.name: Can they hang from the chain in endgame?
Can they score in the trap during endgame?

Strategy and Gameplay.name: In general, are they better at being an offensive bot or a defensive one?
How efficient is their cycle time? (Cycle time: From your side, go across, get note from source, come back, score)
Are they willing to do coopertition?
Any other comments about their game strategy?

Past Events and Practice.name: How much has their human player practiced? How close does their practice environment reflect the actual field?
How much do their drivers and operators practice?
Any other comments about previous regionals / practice?

Social / Misc.name: What is one thing that they are proud of?
What is one thing they hope to improve?
How many student team members do they have?
How many mentors / adult team members do they have?

Photos.name: Take several photos of their robot
Take a picture of their pit
If possible, take a picture of their auto routes

Final comments.name: Do you have any final comments?
